name: Starry Kittens (WIP)
description:
Entry for the Magical Girl Game Jam #7!

Uwina is a regular girl until she meets a Starry Kitten on her way home late at night. It asks for her help to defeat the Nachtmahr who has spread nightmares amongst the denizens of the city. She agrees to help the Starry Kitten and transforms into a Magical Girl to collect Elemental Starry Kittens and defeat the nightmares.

Gameplay  .｡.:*☆

Use WASD to move

F to interact

Q and E to rotate the world

Collect elementally charged Starry Kittens to defeat the nightmares. Match the elements seen in the dream - you can use the same element twice - to send the kittens into the dream and defeat the fear. Select the cats on the lower right via your mouse and press F to enter the dream. 

DISCLAIMER: As of now, there is only one experimental dream in the game. The level and the dreams will be added as soon as possible. 

Credits  .｡.:*☆

Transformation Music: Soda by Sakura Girl

Background Music and Intro Music by Goeff Harvey

Various Soundeffects from Pixabay
